item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: haoweiDabeast
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: haoweiDabeast
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: haoweiDabeast
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://dev-haowei.pantheonsite.io.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Portfolio
item.dc:creator: haoweiDabeast
item.content:encoded:
Portfolio

Some projects I have done

Good work ethic makes me happy with working and deliver good work

LetsEat

LetsEat app, developed through Java and Android Studio, is designed for lonely BU students to dine out with other lonely BU students.
Users will be matched with other users through the food they like, their major, and hobbies.
In the app, besides general programming, my team has implemented Firebase, in app real-time chat, Yelp Fusion, and Twitch Tag.

I was the architect and lead engineer for our team.

LetsEat link

User Designed Connective Structure

With the software User Designed Connective Structure, short for UDCS, we have developed through Python, users can use the interface developed by my team and draw control points that generate curve through Bezier curve and output as DFX, which later can be used for generating 3D meshes.

I was the architect and lead engineer for our team.

Repository Link
Hackathon project:
Chronotivity

With limited time, 24hrs, my team was able to build an app to calculate the best time for people to work and their most efficient time in a day, as well as giving a spirit animal based on their life activity.
This software is developed mainly through Python and aimed to boost productivity.

I was the architect and lead engineer for this project.

Our page

Car Rental System

To study SDLC development more, I led a team and we developed a car rental system with Java in a waterfall model.

I was the architect and lead engineer for the team

Our repository

For more projects that can possibly interest you, please check my personal GitHub

Click here

Voxelizer

Written in C++ and built with CMake, my software is able to turn a obj file into a voxelized obj file, this enable people to do more precise calculation of the object, more customization ability, and as well as achieving aesthetic looking.

My Repository Link

3D engine and animation

Programmed with OpenGl Shading Language, short for GLSL, and Python, I was able to develop a 3D engine and a running animation while every creatures and things in the scenes are moving in my algorithms. Texture mapping, normal mapping, quaternion, and many techniques are using in the program. 

My Repository Link

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: haoweiDabeast
item.content:encoded:
I'm Software Engineer
Haowei Li

CS BA from Boston University makes me realized school was not enough for me, but more self research, study, practice, and take on projects can greatly improve my skills

About Me

Always strive, always improve, always impress

Developing With a Passion While Exploring The World.

I was once struggling as I started CS, but as time went through, and the more I programmed, I gradually fell in love with it.

Projects, projects, and projects. I made friends through working with people, and improving together became my way of software engineering.

Contact Me

Throughout my undergraduate, school work couldn't satisfy me, thus I worked on many side projects, eager to learn more and eager to do more.

This GitHub link contains some projects I had worked on, both solo and group: My GitHub

What I can do

Adaptability is the key, hence I learn and learn fast

Software Development
Mobile Development
Backend Development
DevOps Engineering
Soft Skills
Communication
Project Management
Collaboration/Teamwork
Web Development
Angular Development
Frontend Development
Full Stack Development

Working Process

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus,
luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

Work Experience

CS related jobs

Pfizer Web Developer Intern 05/2022 - 09/2022

The BioMedicine Design Department makes extensive use of protein structure data obtained by our crystallography group. This data is stored in a relational database. The previous web portal used older java applet technology to access and view the data. My job was to build a more modern framework to access the crystallography data, to extend the web portal to provide more comprehensive access to the structural data.

Web Developer

Please Contact me

I need more job experience, and you need a good employee.
I am the person you are looking for.

Check more of my works

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: haoweiDabeast
item.content:encoded:
About Me

Programming With Passion While Exploring The World

Working hard and working with responsibility is always my style.

Because of my working ethic and passion, I had a lot of opportunities working with others.

Let's talk with me.
haoweilee666@gmail.com
Leadership

With my passion and skills, I often worked as the architect and lead engineer for the projects I worked with others.

Having group side projects is awesome, but at the meantime, I always worked on my personal projects to refresh and sharpen my skills.

Frontend and Backend Developer
Due to many project experience I was able to learn many skills.

Here is my programming language proficiency for your better understanding, the rating is based on how comfortable to me to code in the language.

Some of my work samples are listed with pictures in my portfolio tab

Entry                                            Intermediate                               Proficient

Java HTML CSS JavaScript TypeScript Python Ocaml XML C++ MatLab C Groovy
